targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time_bucket('1 minute', executed_at) as time,
  COALESCE(COUNT(*), 0) as total_remediations
FROM remediations
WHERE $__timeFilter(executed_at)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time_bucket('1 minute', executed_at) as time,
  CASE
    WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 0.0
    ELSE COALESCE((COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE success = true) * 100.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)), 0.0)
  END as success_rate
FROM remediations
WHERE $__timeFilter(executed_at)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time_bucket('1 minute', executed_at) as time,
  CASE
    WHEN COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE completed_at IS NOT NULL) = 0 THEN 0.0
    ELSE COALESCE(AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (completed_at - executed_at)) FILTER (WHERE completed_at IS NOT NULL)), 0.0)
  END as avg_duration
FROM remediations
WHERE $__timeFilter(executed_at)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  COALESCE(strategy, 'other') as strategy,
  COALESCE(COUNT(*), 0) as count
FROM remediations
WHERE $__timeFilter(executed_at)
  
GROUP BY strategy
ORDER BY count DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT
  time_bucket('1 minute', executed_at) as time,
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE success = true) as "Successful",
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE success = false) as "Failed"
FROM remediations
WHERE $__timeFilter(executed_at)
  
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time_bucket('1 minute', executed_at) as time,
  COALESCE(AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (completed_at - executed_at))), 0.0) as "Avg Duration",
  COALESCE(MAX(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (completed_at - executed_at))), 0.0) as "Max Duration"
FROM remediations
WHERE $__timeFilter(executed_at)
  AND namespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'kube-public', 'kube-node-lease', 'local-path-storage')
  AND completed_at IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  executed_at as timestamp,
  pod_name,
  namespace,
  COALESCE(strategy, action) as strategy,
  success,
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (completed_at - executed_at)) as duration,
  error_message,
  action as actions_taken
FROM remediations
WHERE $__timeFilter(executed_at) AND namespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'kube-public', 'kube-node-lease', 'local-path-storage')
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 100

SELECT
  time_bucket('1 minute', executed_at) as time,
  COALESCE(strategy, 'other') as strategy,
  COALESCE(COUNT(*), 0) as count
FROM remediations
WHERE $__timeFilter(executed_at)
  
GROUP BY time, strategy
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  COALESCE(strategy, 'other') as strategy,
  COALESCE(COUNT(*), 0) as total,
  COALESCE((COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE success = true) * 100.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)), 0.0) as success_rate,
  COALESCE(AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (completed_at - executed_at))), 0.0) as avg_duration
FROM remediations
WHERE $__timeFilter(executed_at)
  
GROUP BY strategy
ORDER BY total DESC

SELECT
  time_bucket('1 minute', executed_at) as time,
  COALESCE(COUNT(*), 0) as value
FROM remediations
WHERE $__timeFilter(executed_at)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

  time_bucket('1 minute', executed_at) as time,

GROUP BY time
